sourcesContent:
<template>
  <input
    type="text"
    :readonly="readonly"
    :value="value"
    @input="change($event)"
  />
</template>

<script>
export default {
  props: ["readonly", "emitter", "ikey", "getData", "putData"],
  data() {
    return {
      value: 0
    }
  },
  methods: {
    change(e) {
      this.value = e.target.value
      this.update()
    },
    update() {
      if (this.ikey) this.putData(this.ikey, this.value)
      this.emitter.trigger("process")
    }
  },
  mounted() {
    this.value = this.getData(this.ikey)
  }
}
</script>

<style>
select,
input {
  width: 100%;
  border-radius: 30px;
  background-color: white;
  padding: 2px 6px;
  border: 1px solid #999;
  font-size: 110%;
  width: 170px;
}
</style>
